snippet: For Ms. Sze, installing an exhibition isn’t simply a matter of transporting her work from studio to gallery but an integral part of her creative process.
abstract: Sarah Sze's solo show at Tanya Bonakdar Gallery is her first in United States in five years; actual set-up of exhibit with seemingly  random placement of small and delicate bits is part of her creative process and follows precise design.
lead_paragraph: For Ms. Sze, installing an exhibition isn’t simply a matter of transporting her work from studio to gallery but an integral part of her creative process.

headline.main: Sarah Sze Aims for Precise Randomness in Installing Her Gallery Show
headline.print_headline: The Art Behind the Art of a Gallery Installation
